name: Return of the Sword God-Rank Civil Servant
author: Sajeok
content: Ahn Su-ho. was the Sword God. Surprisingly, humanity&#039s greatest swordsman player was a civil servant hunter affiliated with the Korean Hunter Association. Su-ho chose the path of a public servant purely to end the gates. Perhaps thatâ€™s why when one of the disaster-level gates, called the final gate, was attacked, In an ironic turn of events, he was betrayed by his comrades. &quotIt would have been better if he had joined us from the beginning. Public servants are so stubborn.&quot The reason
